name: International Superstar Soccer Deluxe Plus
summary: The project will be the final evolution of a definitive ROM for the game, bringing unprecedented gameplay improvements and maintaining the already consolidated improvements in skills with team characterization (Jorge Guimarães) for the use of the game in online competitions: “International Superstar Soccer Deluxe Plus”, modification based on the previous project: “International Superstar Soccer Deluxe (SA)”.
